title: Are there any naked eye stars (other than our sun) that have known exoplanets orbiting them? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, there are a few. The bright 1st magnitude star Fomalhaut (Alpha Pisces Austrinus) has at least one exoplanet orbiting it (Fomalhaut b) that has been imaged by the Hubble Space Telescope. The magnitude 3.5 star Tau Ceti has a possible set of four planets in orbit around it.
